en.title: THANH VY - INTERNATIONAL PMU JUDGE & MAIN SPEAKER AT BROWVISTA
en.shortDescription: Meet Thanh Vy, CEO of VyBrows Academy - International PMU judge, main speaker at BROWVISTA Vietnam, and renowned expert in permanent makeup industry.
en.content:
Thanh Vy - Leading the International PMU Industry

In the world of permanent makeup, few names carry the weight and prestige of Thanh Vy, CEO and founder of VYBROWS ACADEMY. With over a decade of experience and international recognition, Thanh Vy has established herself as a leading authority in the PMU industry, not just in Houston but across the globe.

International Judge at Prestigious PMU Competitions

Thanh Vy's expertise has been recognized at the highest levels of the permanent makeup industry. Her journey as an international judge includes:

Congreso Internacional Spa MÃ©dico Micropigmentacion - Mexico 2023

In 2023, Thanh Vy served as a distinguished judge at the Congreso Internacional Spa MÃ©dico Micropigmentacion in Mexico, one of Latin America's most prestigious permanent makeup and medical spa conferences. This international congress brings together the world's top PMU artists, medical professionals, and beauty experts to showcase cutting-edge techniques and innovations.

As a judge, Thanh Vy evaluated:
âœ“ Advanced microblading techniques
âœ“ Ombre powder brow artistry
âœ“ Lip blush innovations
âœ“ Eyeliner and areola reconstruction
âœ“ Color theory and pigment selection

Her presence at this event highlighted her deep understanding of both the artistic and medical aspects of permanent makeup, earning respect from peers worldwide.

New Gen Startlit International Championship - Thailand 2022

In 2022, Thanh Vy was honored to serve as a judge at the New Gen Startlit International Championship in Thailand, a competition that celebrates emerging talent in the permanent makeup industry. This championship focuses on discovering and nurturing the next generation of PMU artists from across Asia and beyond.

During this event, Thanh Vy:
âœ“ Assessed technical precision and artistic creativity
âœ“ Mentored young, aspiring PMU artists
âœ“ Shared insights on building sustainable PMU businesses
âœ“ Evaluated innovative techniques in semi-permanent makeup
âœ“ Connected with international PMU communities

Her role as a judge at this championship demonstrated her commitment to elevating industry standards and supporting emerging talent in the permanent makeup field.

Main Speaker at BROWVISTA Vietnam

Looking ahead to 2025, Thanh Vy will take center stage as the main speaker at BROWVISTA in Vietnam, one of Asia's largest and most influential permanent makeup conferences. This prestigious event attracts thousands of PMU artists, beauty entrepreneurs, and industry leaders from around the world.

What to Expect from Thanh Vy's Keynote

As the main speaker, Thanh Vy will share:
â€¢ Innovative Techniques: Latest trends in microblading, ombre brows, and combination techniques
â€¢ Business Success Strategies: How to build and scale a profitable PMU academy
â€¢ Client Retention Secrets: Creating loyal clientele through exceptional service
â€¢ International Standards: Bringing global best practices to local markets
â€¢ Safety & Hygiene Protocols: Ensuring client safety in every procedure

Her presentation will draw from her extensive experience as both a practitioner and educator, offering valuable insights for artists at all skill levels.

From Houston to the World Stage

Thanh Vy's journey began in Houston, Texas, where she founded VYBROWS ACADEMY with a vision to provide world-class permanent makeup services and training. What started as a small studio has grown into an internationally recognized academy that has trained hundreds of successful PMU artists.

Why Thanh Vy Stands Out

  • International Training: Studied under master artists from Korea, Vietnam, and the United States
  • Certified Expert: Holds multiple international certifications in PMU techniques
  • Award-Winning Artist: Recognized for excellence in natural-looking permanent makeup
  • Educator at Heart: Passionate about sharing knowledge and elevating industry standards
  • Innovation Leader: Constantly researching and implementing new techniques and technologies
  • Cultural Bridge: Combines Eastern precision with Western aesthetics

VYBROWS ACADEMY - Where Excellence Meets Passion

Under Thanh Vy's leadership, VYBROWS ACADEMY has become synonymous with quality, safety, and artistry in Houston's permanent makeup scene. The academy offers:

Premium PMU Services

  • Microblading & Powder Brows
  • Combination Brow Techniques
  • Lip Blush & Color Correction
  • Eyeliner Tattoo
  • Areola Reconstruction
  • Dark Lip Neutralization

Professional Training Programs

  • PMU Foundation Course
  • Advanced Microblading
  • Ombre Powder Brows Mastery
  • Combo Brow Technique
  • Lip Blush Training
  • Business Mastery for PMU Artists

What Clients Say About Thanh Vy

"I've been to many PMU artists, but Thanh Vy is in a league of her own. Her attention to detail and artistic eye are unmatched. She truly understands facial symmetry and creates the most natural-looking brows I've ever seen!" - Sarah Johnson, Houston

"Training with Thanh Vy changed my life. Not only did I learn advanced PMU techniques, but she also taught me how to run a successful business. She's not just a teacher; she's a mentor who genuinely cares about her students' success." - Emily Chen, PMU Artist

"I flew from California to Houston specifically to get my brows done by Thanh Vy after seeing her work on Instagram. The trip was 100% worth it. She's a true artist and her international experience really shows in her work." - Jessica Martinez, Los Angeles

The Future of PMU: Thanh Vy's Vision

As an international judge and speaker, Thanh Vy is shaping the future of the permanent makeup industry. Her vision includes:

  • Raising global standards for PMU safety and hygiene
  • Making permanent makeup education accessible to aspiring artists worldwide
  • Promoting natural-looking, culturally sensitive PMU techniques
  • Building bridges between Eastern and Western PMU communities
  • Advancing color theory and pigment science in the industry
  • Supporting women entrepreneurs in the beauty industry

Book Your Appointment with an International Expert

Experience the difference that comes from working with an internationally recognized PMU expert. Whether you're looking for beautiful, natural permanent makeup or want to start your journey as a PMU artist, VYBROWS ACADEMY is your destination.

Location & Contact Information

ğŸ“ Phone: 346-409-9999 | 346-409-8888

ğŸ“§ Email: vybrowsk@gmail.com

Join the Excellence

Don't miss the opportunity to work with or learn from an internationally acclaimed PMU expert. Contact VYBROWS ACADEMY today to:

  • Schedule your permanent makeup appointment
  • Enroll in professional PMU training courses
  • Learn about upcoming masterclasses and workshops
  • Get personalized consultation for your PMU needs

Call now: 346-409-9999

VYBROWS ACADEMY - Where International Excellence Meets Local Care

es.title: THANH VY - JUEZA INTERNACIONAL DE PMU Y ORADORA PRINCIPAL EN BROWVISTA
es.shortDescription: Conozca a Thanh Vy, CEO de VyBrows Academy - Jueza internacional de PMU, oradora principal en BROWVISTA Vietnam y reconocida experta en la industria del maquillaje permanente.
es.content:
Thanh Vy - Liderando la Industria Internacional de PMU

En el mundo del maquillaje permanente, pocos nombres tienen el peso y prestigio de Thanh Vy, CEO y fundadora de VYBROWS ACADEMY. Con mÃ¡s de una dÃ©cada de experiencia y reconocimiento internacional, Thanh Vy se ha establecido como una autoridad lÃ­der en la industria PMU, no solo en Houston sino en todo el mundo.

Jueza Internacional en Competencias Prestigiosas de PMU

La experiencia de Thanh Vy ha sido reconocida en los niveles mÃ¡s altos de la industria del maquillaje permanente.

Congreso Internacional Spa MÃ©dico Micropigmentacion - MÃ©xico 2023

En 2023, Thanh Vy se desempeÃ±Ã³ como distinguida jueza en el Congreso Internacional Spa MÃ©dico Micropigmentacion en MÃ©xico.

New Gen Startlit International Championship - Tailandia 2022

En 2022, Thanh Vy fue honrada al servir como jueza en el New Gen Startlit International Championship en Tailandia.

Oradora Principal en BROWVISTA Vietnam

Thanh Vy tomarÃ¡ el escenario central como oradora principal en BROWVISTA en Vietnam.
